name: Sell Phones BD (resale phones selling page)
d1: Admin can see All Users (sellers or buyers) that login information on this site, Admin can delete any users.
d2: Sellers can add a product, Advertise a product, Seller can See their product List, sell/available, and delete any added products. Uses Admin, sellers, and buyers dashboards.
d3: Create account users choose seller or buyers account. Buyers can book a product, Buyers can see his products. If buyers of any product to paid this product are not displayed. The payment method uses stripe.
d4: Verify route to JWT. Fully responsive page.
d5: React, Tailwind, DaisyUI, React Dom, Firebase, MongoDB, Node, Express, Vercel, etc.

name: Candid Captures (photography services page)
d1: Users can see all services and details page. If the user login, you can add reviews for any services.
d2: User all reviews show (my reviews). Users can edit, and delete any reviews.
d3: Users can add any service on this page. Show more clients I served, most famous picture gallery.
d4: Firebase authentication ans fully responsive page.
d5: React, Tailwind, DaisyUI, React Dom, Firebase, MongoDB, Node, Express, Vercel, etc.

name: The Smart Tutor (learning tutorials page)
d1: Users can see all tutorials and details page. If users log in there are shown to the checkout route.
d2: Users can show category types tutorials. They are more information to get more ideas to try it.
d3: Users can download PDF files of any details page. Any time practice this topic.
d4: Verify route to JWT. Fully responsive page.
d5: React, Tailwind, DaisyUI, React Dom, Firebase, MongoDB, Node, Express, Vercel, etc.
